items.title: Populate K8s Secrets (dev)
items.body: Create Secret maestro-secrets in maestro-system with: POSTGRES_URL, REDIS_URL, JWT_SECRET, SESSION_SECRET, AUTH0_*, AZURE_*, GOOGLE_*, BASE_URL, OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT. Create PD key in monitoring.

items.title: Deploy Canary (dev)
items.body: Apply deploy/argo/rollout-maestro.yaml, set image to sha-${GITHUB_SHA}; watch canary.
